movies.Title: Inception
movies.Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page

movies.Title: The Matrix
movies.Plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movies.Actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

movies.Title: Interstellar
movies.Plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movies.Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain

movies.Title: The Dark Knight
movies.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
movies.Actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

movies.Title: Pulp Fiction
movies.Plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.Actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

movies.Title: Fight Club
movies.Plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.
movies.Actors: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter

movies.Title: Forrest Gump
movies.Plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
movies.Actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

movies.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies.Title: The Godfather
movies.Plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.Actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth.
movies.Actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
